title: Welcome to Schoology Plus!
message: Thanks for installing Schoology Plus! Click here to check out all of the interesting features! Be sure to check out the Schoology Plus menu at the top of the page next to the messages button.
shortMessage: Thanks for installing Schoology Plus! Click here for more info.

title: Schoology Plus for Firefox!
message:
Schoology Plus is now available for Firefox! The extension is not on the Firefox addon store, but it can be downloaded from the following links:
GitHub Link
Direct Download Link (for Firefox only)
shortMessage: Schoology Plus is now available for Firefox

message:
Please take one minute of your time to give some feedback regarding your use of Schoology Plus. This survey is very short, and all questions are optional. Thank you!

Click Here to Take the Survey
shortMessage: Please fill out a quick survey
title: Schoology Plus Survey
